org.gvsig.tools.service.spi

Class AbstractServiceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gvsig.tools.service.spi.AbstractServiceManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServiceManager
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultPublishServiceManager, DefaultPublishSwingServiceManager

    public abstract class AbstractServiceManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServiceManager
    Base ServiceManager implementation which stores the registered ServiceFactory objects into a Map, using the name as the key.
